parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check whether driver position of the vehicle turret is locked.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lockedDriver''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_driverLocked = [[lockedDriver]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[vehicle]], [[driver]]
</value></part></template>
